item.title: Digital Crisis | Home - Houston Computer Repair Home & Business
item.description: We provide and maintains the highest quality of personalized computer repair services with honesty and integrity with customer service being the number one goal.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Apple PC Laptops Computer IT Support
item.description: We offer a full array of computer repair and IT support services to homes and businesses. Bring your system into our shop or schedule an onsite appointment.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - In-Shop Computer Support Services
item.description: A full service 'Repair Shop' with state of the art equipment and tools.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Onsite Computer Support Services
item.description: Free pickups & delivery, and we will even disconnect and reconnect your desktop computer.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - PC Computer Repair Services
item.description: Full diagnostics and repair of all hardware and software problems.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Laptop / Notebook Repair Services
item.description: All laptops are repaired in our local shop. DC Jack Repair, AC Adaptor Replacement, LCD Screen and Inverter Replacement for laptops with blank or cracked displays.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Apple Mac Repair Services
item.description: Full diagnostic & repair of both software and hardware problems. MacOS Cleanups, Optimizations, MacOS Reload, & User Data Migration.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Computer Networking Support Services
item.description: Diagnose & solve any computer network related issue. Internet Connection Issues with Cable, DSL, and Dial Up.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Virus & Malware Removal Services
item.description: Full virus cleanups and operating system repair to correct problems caused by viruses. We can remove all types of infections. (spyware, adware, trojans, worms, and root kits)

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Data Backup & Recovery Services
item.description: Advanced Data Recovery techniques to recover lost files, deleted files, or even files from a failing hard drive.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Server Support Services
item.description: Full diagnostic & repair of both software and hardware problems. Windows Server Support (Exchange Email Server, File Server, Active Directory, DNS, Domain Controllers)

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Managed IT Services
item.description: Outsource your IT department to Digital Crisis and save big. We offer a complete, one-stop solution for all your business's IT needs.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Retail Point of Sales (POS) Support Services
item.description: Diagnostic and repair of most Point Of Sales systems. Installation and implementation of Point Of Sales systems.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Custom Built Computer Services
item.description: Any kind of computer system you want, we can build it. We build based on your needs and specifications.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Handheld Electronics Support Services
item.description: We can even repair most of your handheld electronics like digital camaeras and cellphones. iPod, iPhone, iPad cracked and failed screen repair.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Computer Training Servicesc
item.description: Digital Crisis is here to inform and educate everyone of our clients. We can help teach you preventive maintenance and measures to take to avoid a crisis.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Services - Free Electronics Recycling Services
item.description: Electronics waste is an ever increasing problem in our modern times. This is why are offering the public a free service to properly recycle and dispose of old and unused computer systems.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Prices - Just Fix It Full PC MAC Repair Package
item.description: The easiest to understand computer repair pricing in the industry. Simplified, so that you can make the right choice on whether to repair your computer or not.

item.description: Complete Computer Repair Package

item.description: Your Own IT Department a Call Away

item.title: Digital Crisis | Prices - Fastest Turnaround Time
item.description: Our average turnaround time is only 1 to 2 days. Additional time may be needed with severe virus infections and to order non-stock parts.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Prices - Free Diagnostics
item.description: Digital Crisis offers free diagnostics so that you can make an informed decision on whether to repair or replace you computer.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Prices - Free Pickup & Delivery
item.description: Digital Crisis provides a free pickup & delivery service to all businesses & homes inside the I-610 loop.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Prices - Student Discounts
item.description: Digital Crisis gives a 10% discount on labor for all college students. Just present your student ID to save.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Prices - Free Recycling
item.description: Digital Crisis allows you to drop off your old computers and equipment for safe recycling.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Prices - Free Consultation
item.description: Call today to talk to a real technician and get free advice and answers to your computer questions.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Prices - Free Site Survey
item.description: Small, medium, and large businesses are all entitled to a free site survey. Our IT business professional will assess your equipment and needs to find the best solution for your business.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Why Digital Crisis - Competitive Computer Repair
item.description: We provide and maintain the highest quality of personalized computer repair services with honesty and integrity. Competitive pricing and service is priority.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Why Digital Crisis - Competitor Price Comparison
item.description: Why spend more by taking your computer to the geeks. Bring your computer into Digital Crisis for fair and honest service.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Why Digital Crisis - Free Services
item.description: Free diagnostics, free pickup & deliveries, free consultations, free site survery, and free computer recycling services.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Why Digital Crisis - Extra Discounts
item.description: Giving back to the community by offering extra discounts for students and senior citizens. Ten percent off for students. Fifteen percent off for senior citizens.

item.title: Digital Crisis | About Us - Socially Conscious Computer Repair
item.description: Digital Crisis's mission is to provide and maintain the highest quality of personalized computer repair services with honesty and integrity to everyone.

item.title: Digital Crisis | About Us - Mission Statement
item.description: Digital Crisis's mission is to provide and maintain the highest quality of personalized computer services with honesty and integrity to everyone, to offer a rewarding and nurturing work environment for experienced computer techs, and to give back to our community by offering free and discounted public services.

item.title: Digital Crisis | About Us - Company Profile
item.description: Conceived in 2005 with just two people, Digital Crisis is now a leading service driven, IT support company with a dozen highly experienced technicians ready to help. In early 2009, we relocated to Downtown Houston to be centrally located to better serve all of the Houston area.

item.title: Digital Crisis | About Us - Our Founders
item.description: The collective background and experience of our team is one of the main qualities that sets us apart from any other IT company. With a combinded experiece of over 40 years, our staff is able to solve just about any technical problem for your home or business.

item.title: Digital Crisis | About Us - Billy Hathcock
item.description: Billy has over twenty years of experience in the Commercial and Personal IT field and over ten years in business management.

item.title: Digital Crisis | About Us - Robert Smith
item.description: Robert is a life long computer tech and has been fixing computers since before he could even read what was on the screen. With over thirteen years of experience as a freelance computer tech and web developer, he has aquired the neccessary skills to quickly solve just about any computer problem.

item.title: Digital Crisis | About Us - Zach Kitchen
item.description: Zach has been building, repairing, and upgrading computers since he was in junior high school. Professionally, Zach gained experience working as an IT/System administrator for an internet caf√©, managing over two dozen PCs with a server that controlled it all.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - Common Computer Repair Answers
item.description: Answers to the most commonly asked questions about having a computer repaired and what to expect. Call or email us to ask us any computer question!

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - What do I need to bring in to have my computer fixed?
item.description: When you bring your computer into our shop for service, there is no need to bring a bunch of stuff. We don't need any keyboards, monitors...

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - How long will it take to have my computer fixed?
item.description: In-shop service usually takes 1-2 days, depeding on the problems we find and parts ordered...

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - What if my computer isn't worth repairing and I decline service?
item.description: We offer free diagnostics on inshop repairs, so that you are able to make the right economic decision...

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - What is the difference between Laptop and Desktop repair?
item.description: Repairing a laptop, notebook, or netbook is NOT the same as repairing a desktop computer system...

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - Will my files be backed up during repair?
item.description: Yes. Making a backup image of your hard drive is apart of our inshop repair service...

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - What is the difference between data recovery and data back-up?
item.description: Data Recovery is a service we offer to recover lost or accidentally deleted files...

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - How far will you guys travel to go onsite?
item.description: We serve Houston and all the surrounding communities. All homes and businesses within a 50 mile radius...

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - What makes you different then Geek Squad or other local geek crews?
item.description: Many of our best customers have come to us after a Geek Squad repair experience...

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - Will you guys send my laptops out-of-state like Geek Squad does?
Digital Crisis | Questions? - Is there a warranty or guarantee of service?
item.description: Yes! Our services are covered by a 30 day warranty*. Please click here to view our Guarantee page...

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - How is my privacy protected?
item.description: Every single technician follows a strict privacy policy. Please click here to view our Privacy Policy page...

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - What are Digital Crisis's terms of service?
item.description: Please click here to view our Terms of Service page...

item.title: Digital Crisis | Questions? - Can I work for Digital Crisis?
item.description: We are always seeking experienced computer enthusiasts that love to help people...

item.description: Our clients tell the story the best. Read about the positive stories of our happy customers and their computer repair experiences. Satisfaction is guaranteed!

item.description: We love feedback! So please tell us about your experience with Digital Crisis. If you were unsatisfied for any reason, then let us know so we can make it right.

item.description: Easy way to leave your feedback about our services. Share your good experiences and testimonials on our Rate Point consumer rating service page.

item.description: Being at the top of Google is a true testiment of popularity. We can easily be found with a quick search on Google's Maps. Spread the word by leaving a short review that will help put us on the map.

item.description: We're centrally located in Downtown Houston, Texas. Although we primarily serve Houston and the surrounding communities, we also offer our services nationwide.

item.description: Digital Crisis is a customer service driven company, and we are focused on offering the highest quality service possible to every single client.

item.description: Digital Crisis can remote into your computer and correct minor software issues.

item.description: Follow us on our blog to keep up to date on the latest news about Digital Crisis. Also check back for useful computer tips and reviews.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Check Repair Status - Realtime Progress Reports
item.description: With us you can check the status of your repair in real time online. Simply, login with your ticket number and monitor your computer's repair status as it happens.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Terms of Service - What To Expect How We Operate
item.description: Our terms of service are clear and easy to understand so that you know exactly what to expect on how we operate. No hidden fees or charges.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Privacy Policy - User Data Privacy Protection
item.description: Our clients' privacy and personal data is protected and kept confidential throughout the entire repair process. Our secure backup server ensures security.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Guarantee - Warranty Guaranteed Computer Repair
item.description: Satisfaction guaranteed computer repair. All of our labor services are covered by a thirty (30) day warranty and guarantee the highest quality service possible.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Site Map - Easier Navigation Find Computer Help
item.description: Site map allows for easier navigation of our website and to help you to quickly locate the computer help you need. View all computer repair services offered.

item.title: Digital Crisis | Careers - Rewarding Computer Work Environment
item.description: Our team is always seeking out highly skilled computer technicians. If you love to work on computers and enjoy helping others, then submit your resume today.

item.description: Print our brochure and share with friends and family. Our entire website captured in one pamphlet. Check out services and easy to understand rates.
